channel.title: CVE Feed for Adobe -- XMP Toolkit
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Adobe -- XMP Toolkit

item.title: CVE-2023-38210|2024-08-02T17:30:14.196Z -- adobe -- xmp%20toolkit
item.description: Adobe XMP Toolkit versions 2022.06 is affected by a Uncontrolled Resource Consumption vulnerability. An unauthenticated attacker could leverage this vulnerability to achieve an application denial-of-service in the context of the current user. Exploitation of this issue requires user interaction in that a victim must open a malicious file.
